reviews.text: Lots of fun dressing up in regal clothing to take photos. Only RM3 for costume rental (without accessories). Add more money for accessories. That's how they lure you in. It's very reasonable for the school children who were there. They also have personal photographers to take your photos. The costumes are very hot and you will sweat inside. The shop attendants will just put them over a fan to dry them.

Beautiful historical palace. Must visit place in Medan. You can try traditional outfit and taking picture with the palace as your background.

Sunset is one of the main object for taking picture here. You will have to share your spot with other tourists.

Coming at night gave you different view of the palace, but you can't go inside to explore the palace. But still worth it.

The iconic palace of Deli sultanate of North Sumatera province. Being a historic place, this architecture is far from being fit for public display. From the unmaintained exterior/interior, untidy souvenir shops, to the extreme lack of exhibits, it is hard to imagine how long it would take to restore it to its glorious days. The building has got 2 storeys and is dominated by yellow/golden color scheme. Architecture style is of Malay mix Dutch colonial style with plenty of Arabic accents. Currently there are only 2 chambers that you could visit on normal days, entry fee is Rp. 5000,- as at March 2019. Traditional dance and instruments performance are available on select days. Guided tours happen usually on weekends. Government need to intervene and save this place.

The palace looks better from the outside. There isn't much to see inside. If you want to know about the history of the place and the Deli Sultanate, you can get a guide. I would skip this place if you're not much into history, have little time to spare, or not interested in dressing up in traditional songket costume.

Beautiful palace. Very nice. I love the interior of this palace. There is souvenir shops and traditional outfit rent inside. I tried the traditional outfit and took photos wearing it. It only cost you between 10.000 to 50.000 to rent the outfit (depending on what model you choose to wear). Entrance fee to enter this palace is very cheap. It's only 5.000 rupiah. 

Unfortunately, the outside part of this place need some renovation. It's so messy and poorly maintained. The management should consider to redesign the it to make it more attractive for tourist.

Active worship place for Chinese Buddhism and Taoism in Medan. An old worship place in a serene secluded area. Quite extensive numbers of Shrines and Chinese Gods/Goddess Statues. Might be a good place to interact and out learn Chinese believes.

A huge temple with beautiful sights. On ordinary days, there is not much to do but just look around and take photos. There might be changes in the atmosphere during some events but on ordinary day, expect nothing more than a quiet place
So many God statue here, especially chinese one.. good place to say a pray and we can also asked one to solved our problems cause there is some 'special' people with certain unhuman ability.
Historical place, nice temple.
An amazing temple

One of the nicest place to visit in Medan. It is open to the public, non Muslim included. However, you have to be properly covered up. It is not a problem as they will rent you the appropriate items and even help to dress you up. All for a small token sum. The masjid itself is free entry. It is very clean and there is the men prayer section where women are not allowed to enter. Otherwise, you are free to roam around.
Very beautiful building of Dutch style.. It should be managed well about the entrance and paying ticket for the shoes ... Business for a few people..
The icon of Medan city. Everyone who is visiting Medan must visit this place too. Historic mosque with unique culture.

This is the first masjid in Medan that I praying in. I love the design and I love the wideness of the yard of this masjid.
This beautiful design with the hexagon or octagon design makes the shaf of this masjid is not completely the same in every shaf. 
And make the people not as many as if the design is square.
But that is the plus point of this masjid. Beautiful.

This is the Great Mosque of Medan City, North Sumatera Indonesia. A very beautiful Mosque, so clean and tidy. You must visit this mosque as you arrive in Medan.
They provide a guest book and ask for donation.
Nice view in the temple and we are fortunate to witness local wedding taking place over there
A must visit place. Love the artistic design
Beautiful temple in the heart of medan.

Sri Mariamman Temple is medan's oldest Hindu tempel. This temple was built in 1884 for the worship of Goddess mariammam.The temple is situated in the area known as kampuang madrass or Medan's littel India. This temple is also devoted to the Hindu Gods ganesha and mrurgan. children of mariamman. The Gate is decorated bygopuram, namely storey tower which can usually be found at the gate of the Hindus temples in south  India. The temple is a meeting point for worshippers during Thaipusam and Deevapali festivals
The location near Sun Plaza shopping Mall and food corner, but the traffic is crowded.

A traditional Peranakan house with most of the original decor and furniture. It's also a museum and showcases the family that owns it, the Tjong. The house was built by Tjong A Fie, a prominent figure in the history of Medan, for his third wife. You can wander on your own, or get a guide. I highly recommend getting one.
It is a historical place well maintained by the Tjong family. The photos displayed tell their own stories but there are guides to explain the details of the Tjong family. A must visit place in Medan!

This is one of the must-visit historical place in Medan. Tjong A Fie is a successful Chinese businessman in Medan, and this mansion is his living place. Most of the interior are still authentic, some are replicas. The atmosphere is really nice and there's a lot of instagramable spot. Overall i really recommend this place to whoever visiting Medan
One of the main attractions in Medan. Walking distance from the main square and the train station. Perfect for people that love history, architecture and interior designs.
Great place. I feel like i travel back in time. They're doing a good job maintaining most of the household items and make a great replica when the chairs/table is broken
Taman Simalem Resort Sales office.
Nice view. Value for money. Jgn lupa bawa baju tebal. Dingin banget. Bnyk guest activity, good cofee and Tea, must try. Keuren tempatnya. View to danau Toba bener2 memukau.
Tempat ini dekat dengan Indomaret , jadi bagi anda yang ingin jajan sambil menunggu interview kerja cukup senang
Luar biasa
Wow

Very nice park and food court. The food court is a really lively place with many locals spending their free time. In the weekend it can get really crowded here. Next to the food court is a sort of shuttle court where you can walk or run around. Inside is a large grass field where the youngsters play in the evening.
Good place for hangout with your friends and your family. There are many restaurants, cafe and food court. You also can relax and enjoy your day. The night is the best time to visit merdeka walk

Merdeka walk is in heart of Medan. There is many cafe and food court here. Merdeka walk always be attractive and enjoyable. In the morning you can excercise here jogging or running and after that you can enjoy the culinary. Nice place

Good place to hang out with friends for dinner. There's a big park nearby so one can just walk around or play or do nothing at Al.

As for food, there's nothing special for the place. You will find all of the restaurants on various parts of Medan.

Nice place to enjoy your free time with doing sports in the morning.
You can do jogging, yoga, aerobic, or gym with the equipment around here.

You can also find many types of food here, we call it jajanan.
The famous one is egg-sausage, baked meatballs, and many else.

In the night, especially Saturday night, the atmosphere is really crowded of people that hanging out with friends or families. They choose restaurant in Merdeka Walk because it's located strategically near Centre Point and another big place.

Great vibe great food good place to hang out but for me the place a bit dark especially when you carry out children. I order bread pudding and it is delicious some of my friend order ice cream and banana split and also have a good response. Definitely will be back
Dessert was nice, pasta ok, ambience just so so.
GB bistro is used to be called Gelato Bar. The good thing about this place is they have smoking room inside with air conditioning. Mostly smoking area in senayan city are located outdoor.

this noodles is highly recommend, it very tasty pork. this place is quite hard to park, especially cars.
there are no parking lot.
it fit for brunch or lunch, with tasty topping from pork belly.

I always miss the food here. The noodles and taste different like others pangsit noodles. The soup, pangsit (dumpling) was delicious and had lot of pork meat. With additional chili (cabai potong) it’s just right flavor. 

Price was bit pricey but for me it worth it for that taste.

If you’re looking for a nice bakmi in Medan, this is the place. Unless you don’t like pork of course. The meal was fragrant and the noodles were tasty. The place might have street sellers coming in from the outside of the place to offer things though.

Holy moly! This place serves great noodles! The jumbo portion was not too jumbo and fits right in to a hungry big man like myself. The broth was excellent, the noodles oily smell was great, and the meat was of a great cut. Definitely comes back here again if I have the opportunity.
One of the best pork mie that i ever tasted. The place always full but they manage well so the customer didn't have to wait for long time.
Fusion Bataknesse restaurant. The ambience is pretty upscale. Love the cleanliness of the place. Provide extra expenses when eating in this place. A great quality equals with great amount of money
Omg, the fried pork belly is the best pork belly I've ever tasted! The meat is juicy and the savory just perfect. They also give watermelon and korean tea for free after we finish the meal. Love it!

Food is good, and each order is for one pax - small servings. 

Doesn't really look much, but tastes amazing. Price is above average price in Medan, and in cash terms.

For me....there is nothing special taste  from this restaurant... but if you are looking for some tradisional BATAK food with a good improvement taste for tourist then this place should be the one that you should  consider to visit..

For more than 700 reviews and average star of 4,x , I don't think there's not much can be said about this restaurant. I was introduced to this place by my bro on Cheng beng last year, and we visited this place on Cheng beng this year.

The ribs is superbly delicious, succulent and the sweet spice is finger lickin good. The fried BPK is to die for, crunchy and soft at the same time. Don't forget to dip it to the andaliman chili spice with sweet soy sauce. 

But one thing really struck me this time is how good they are at servicing customers. You'll be warm welcomed by waitresses when you set foot. Waitresses whose are knowledgeable about their menus. They'll put before you samples of their dishes in small plates in tray so you can see for your self which is what in the menu. They'll recommend menus. When you ask for direction (to toilet in my case) they'll show you with open arms, not just pointing with finger. They have board to inform customers if someone's car is blocking another's car who wants to get out of the parking lot. Kudos for the waitresses and the mgmt who train them.

 So if you're a restauranteur and wants to take notes on how to service your customers, I think you can learn a lot by coming to this establishment.

I dont know whats wrong with my order this morning. Lontong ayam plus fried Flies. Iyuuuuh i hate that
I order via aps go****d. My IDR 28k wasted
If you dont like spicy food, you’d better becareful here. There will be green chili that looks like green beans, so better you ask for separate vegetable. Overall, it is delicious.

Lontong Kak Lin is very famous in Medan city; they serve Lontong, pecel, nasi, chicken and boiled egg. The taste of Lontong Kak Lin is very delicious and unforgettable. You have to try this Lontong Kak Lin.
Lontong kak lin. Try the lontong sayur. It was quite good. Couldnt say the same for lontong pecal though. The lupis is too sweet for me
Lontong Kak Lin, located near SMAN 1 Medan, is one of the "must visited" favourite food in Medan.. Te taste are little spicy and authentic
Very tasty and authentic Indian food with friendly service.
Quality of Indian food available at this Indian restaurant in Indonesia is quite good ! Quantity isn't sufficient. Ambience is good as well.
Amazing Indian food. You should try their mutton, its very tender, a lot of flavour there. Chapati also nice here.
the seller is friendly and using indigrient from india and the food is really good. when u go to medan and really miss indian food this is the place u have to eat
Good 👍 service

Really polite hotel. Available good rooms, meetings room and delicious food and beverages both local and national menus. Also provides original coffee stage in the restaurant. If u come to Aceh, I think hermes hotel can be priority hotel to stay...

Almost all important person have been staying on that hotel. Very recommended if you a tuorist or want to visit Aceh and looking for a hotel. Also you can rent a hall room for any of your celebration or making any event ( the garden in Hermes palace is also beautiful, that garden is design and make by LA garden, if you looking for some flowers, tree ,and other plants please visit the LA garden we also can make a decoration stage with flowers and it so beautiful and it's very recommended for you and please stop by in LA garden if you want to see more)

Hello people in the word,  go to this place ok? 
Goofn dld dkdj dnkd dkdjd kdb ksksi shs jsk sjshs jsjsijs dh ndjdj djdb man tap lah pokoknya ya kan hahahahah gggg  gehehe hehisjsjakahajsj hxhxshs jdh dkdh didogd ud Jsjdg Ydu dh Hdhdts Hsudish Hsjdid Hdidis hsidid mantap kan apa juga ku bi"amg, klra2n harus tetap ke sini ya guys. Goof place for all people in the word hehd good bless vor you ate godd place mas bro,  como joi in woth us in this plaxe ok boy,  godd job for every one in the word. Hehe good
Datang datang lah ke sini kawan2 ya,  manta ini tempat kawanku
Ini tempat sangat mantap kawanku,  datang ya

if you compared with another 5 star hotel, i think this hotel rate must be 3 or 4 star, but overall this hotel comfortable, so quite, clean room and free shuttle to Baiturrohman Mosque (by request only for sholat subuh), many coffee shop in the left or right hotel across the street. There is a maintenance now at the lobby area.

Not worth your money. 4/5 star hotel with even worse facilities compared to 3 star hotel.
I booked junior suite (very expensive btw) with high expectation. But all I got was poor AC (already complained to staff but he only said ‘just wait’), brownish water, smelly and damp towel. 
It was the worst experience I have ever had in 4 star hotel

Also the service was really really bad. Very unfriendly and non responsive staff. They provide rental cars and aiport transfer, but when we tried to book airport pick up by phone, they told me to just use the airport taxi because their driver needs to standby on the hotel

The only positive feedback I could think of : the white  bedsheet was clean, with no stain on it
